about.trustText: Every professional goes through a verification process. Real ratings and reviews help you choose with confidence.
about.modestyText: The platform is tailored to the values of the Haredi community, with strict adherence to modesty in all content.

terms.intro: Welcome to the Kanash platform. Using the site constitutes agreement to the terms detailed below.
terms.readCarefully: Please read the terms of use carefully before using the site.
terms.platformNatureText: Kanash is a Discovery platform designed to connect consumers with businesses from the Haredi sector. The site serves as a smart bulletin board only.
terms.noLiabilityText: The site management is not a party to any transaction, agreement, or engagement between the user and the business owner. All responsibility for service quality, product quality, timelines, or payments lies solely with the parties to the transaction.
terms.infoReliabilityText: All content, photos, and videos are uploaded by business owners and are their sole responsibility. The site does not verify the accuracy of presentations or the professional qualifications of advertisers.
terms.aiUsageText: The site uses artificial intelligence (AI) tools for searching and matching services. There may be inaccuracies in search results or chat recommendations, and their use is at the user's responsibility.
terms.communityValuesText: It is strictly prohibited to upload content that does not conform to the spirit of the Haredi community, including photos of women or inappropriate language. The site management reserves the right to remove any content without prior notice.
terms.intellectualPropertyText: The user declares that they own the rights to all media (photo/video) they upload to the site. Uploading content not owned by the user constitutes a violation of the terms of use.
terms.questionsText: For any questions or clarifications regarding the terms of use, please contact us

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro_text: Kanash respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.collect_items: Registration details: name, email, phone|Business details: business name, category, description, location|Photos and media you upload|Usage history and site activity|Technical information: IP address, browser type
privacy.use_items: Operating the site and providing services|Contacting you regarding your account|Improving the service and personalization|Sending updates and notifications (with your consent)|Preventing fraud and abuse
privacy.sharing_text: We do not sell your personal information. Information may be shared:
privacy.sharing_items: With other users (public profile details only)|With service providers acting on our behalf|As required by law
privacy.security_text: We implement advanced security measures to protect your information, including encryption, restricted access, and monitoring of suspicious activity.
privacy.cookies_text: The site uses cookies to improve user experience, analyze traffic, and save preferences. You can manage cookies through your browser settings.
privacy.rights_items: Access your personal information|Correct inaccurate information|Delete your account and information|Object to certain processing of your information
privacy.retention_text: We retain your information as long as your account is active or as required by law. After account deletion, information will be deleted within 30 days.
privacy.changes_text: We may update this policy. We will notify you of material changes through the site or email.
